title._content: Image taken from page 408 of 'History of the Town of Plymouth, Connecticut, with an account of the centennial celebration, May 14 and 15, 1895. Also a sketch of Plymouth, Ohio, settled by local families. [With a preface by L. S. Griggs, and illustrations.

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of the Town of Plymouth, Connecticut, with an account of the centennial celebration, May 14 and 15, 1895. Also a sketch of Plymouth, Ohio, settled by local families. [With a preface by L. S. Griggs, and illustrations.]" Author: ATWATER, Francis. Contributor: GRIGGS, Leverett Stearns. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10412.e.24." Page: 408 Place of Publishing: Meriden, Conn Date of Publishing: 1895 Publisher: Journal Publishing Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000137423 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
